issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Stack trace

 
{code:java}
2018-04-29 16:22:54,266 WARN webapp.GenericExceptionHandler (GenericExceptionHandler.java:toResponse(98)) - INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.service.client.ServiceClient.addKeytabResourceIfSecure(ServiceClient.java:994)
at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.service.client.ServiceClient.submitApp(ServiceClient.java:685)
at org.apache.hadoop.yarn.service.client.ServiceClient.actionCreate(ServiceClient.java:269){code}

cc [~gsaha] [~csingh]
fields.summary: Invalid kerberos principal file name cause NPE in native service

comments.body: [~sunilg] - Thanks for the report. I'm having trouble recreating this and the line numbers don't really seem to align with what I see in trunk or branch-3.1. Can you provide more details on reproducing the NPE?
Thanks [~sunilg]. I see the problem. I could reproduce it. I have tested a patch with a fix. Will upload it soon.
[~sunilg], I attached a patch to fix this. Please review.
